Detailed Description

Author:
Mark Hoemmen
Since:
05 Jul 2005
Date:
Time-stamp: <2008-07-16 10:56:16 mhoemmen>
Jagged diagonal (JAD) format sparse matrix: struct and member functions.

Note:
Original author: Ankit Jain (ankit@berkeley.edu), later revised and expanded by Mark Hoemmen (mhoemmen@cs.berkeley.edu).

Function Documentation

struct jad_matrix_t* csr_to_jad ( struct csr_matrix_t *  A  ) 

this will return a struct jad_matrix_t with all the structures needed for the Jagged Diagonal Algorithm to perform SpMV

void dealloc_jad_matrix ( struct jad_matrix_t *  jS  ) 

Deallocates the storage used by the given jad_matrix_t object, without actually freeing the jS pointer.

void destroy_jad_matrix ( struct jad_matrix_t *  jS  ) 

Deallocates the storage used by the given jad_matrix_t object, and frees the jS pointer.

struct csr_matrix_t* jad_to_csr ( struct jad_matrix_t *  A  ) 

Returns a copy of the given sparse matrix A in CSR format.
